page.title: 06Parker's Transport.
page.content: The firm was started just after the Second World War by myself,{George {Parker,}and my brother F.W.Parker, who is now deceased. We bought three lorries from a firm of two partners who were retiring. Over the years I have built the fleet of vehicles. In 1969 we formed a limited company with myself and my son, Roger Parker, as directors. Our operation is mainly giving a service to the growers of agricultural and horticultural produce and requisites in the South Lincolnshire area. We deliver to wholesale markets all over the country, including places as far apart as South Wales and Scotland. We are also prepared to do haulage of a general nature whenever required to do so. Our distinctive green and mauve lorries are seen everywhere.
